document.full_text: u.s. aviation regulators have suspended two more air traffic controllers for falling asleep on the job, including one who was out of radio contact while a medical flight was trying land.
document.title: more air controllers fall asleep on the job: faa
lines_and_colors: u.s. aviation regulators have suspended two more air traffic controllers for falling asleep on the job, including one who was out of radio contact while a medical flight was trying land.
